themes: importance of public funding for arts organizations
role of arts in community development
personal impact of local arts organizations
key_phrases: expand funding to current sponsored organizations and new organizations too
many arts organizations wouldn’t exist without public funding support
crucial that we focus on ensuring arts organizations can continue to function and exist

continue and support many different grant opportunities
